headline: Kooskia Internment Camp Scrapbook
paragraph: This scrapbook shares the sights, tasks, scenes, and events of Japanese men detained during the camp's two years of operation (May 1943-May 1945).

headline: Nez Perce translation of a portion of the Bible, 1840s
paragraph: Handwritten manuscript of a Nez Perce translation of a portion of the Bible

headline: Black Pioneers: Images of the Black Experience on the North American Frontier
paragraph: This book was published in 1997 and features photographs of the African-American experience in the western United States

headline: Norma Dobler Papers, 1967-1991
paragraph: Materials relating to Norma Dobler's career as a politician, a member of the League of Women Voters, and a delegate to the 1977 National Women's Conference in Houston
